channel.title: Unable to download whonix
channel.description:
Hi
How come all my download attempts of whonix is failing?
No matter which kind of browser, internet connection, or download manager i try, it fails, by getting stuck at 5% 7% or if i am lucky 10%. I have even tried sitting in front of my browser clicking retry as many times as it stops. But in the end what happens is that it just choose to start from 0% again when i have clicked retry alot of times
If have no problems downloading files, and even OS'es that are more than 4GB from other sites
So it might likely be whonix who has troubles with the server that is hosting the file?

item.title: Unable to download whonix
item.dc:creator: TNT_BOM_BOM
item.description:
the https and onion same thing? which server exactly you are using? (post the URL you are downloading from)

Read full topic
